actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $1,000 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income the first $1,000 of interest and dividends on savings deposits or withdrawal accounts in a domestic savings and loan association, bank, credit union, or similar thrift institution in the case of an individual taxpayer under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $1,000 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.
